pullRequest.title: Move rails based pipeline config page to typescript spa
pullRequest.bodyText:
Move rails based pipeline config page to typescript spa

Use toggle new_pipeline_config_spa to see the new pipeline config edit page

curl "https://go-server/go/api/admin/feature_toggles/new_pipeline_config_spa"  \
	-H 'Accept: application/vnd.go.cd.v1+json' \
	-u 'username:password' \
	-X PUT -d '{"toggle_value": "on"}'
Toggle off

Toggle on

nodes.bodyText:
How about: When enabled, provides an option on the pipeline config rails page to use the quick edit SPA.
Cause currently, it does not switch, just shows a button to go to the new SPA!

nodes.bodyText: use enum type instead of string custom type?

initialize items with an empty array?
constructor(items?: readonly T[] = [])
This will avoid the if(items) check in the code

why does the PipelineConfigPage accepts different arguments based on which page is rendered?
To avoid the complexity, can we create the entire pipeline model and pipeline-page always, regardless of the tab we're on?
And in the route setup, we just set the current-tab information, which will render appropriate content on the SPA.
We do not build smaller SPAs for each section of the pipeline config. There is only one SPA for the entire pipeline config. And based on the route, we render the SPA differently.

what happens if instead of passing this attribute we set it at the top level?
Meaning, doing <Link data-test-id="something" /> wouldn't set it?
Something similar to this.
Wouldn't we get this information on the SPA from m.route.get?
Also, Should we come up with a better name for this controller and the SPA?

afterCommit.message: Updated license year in lincense header on file

commit.message: Initial version of pipeline config spa
Add spa link on old pipeline and template edit page when toggle is on
Initial version of collapsible tree component
Render steps on top of the tabs
Added pipeline settings general tab content
Removed extra padding from drag icon
Adding stage settings tab to edit stage
Render list of job in stages
Updated license year in lincense header on file
Removed redundant type declaration for label attribute
Allow group admin to edit pipeline
Removing unused code written as part of pipeline config UI/UX improvement
